Plot
This film follows the 'life' and times of the lead character, 
an android who is purchased as a household robot programmed 
to perform menial tasks. Within a few days the Martin family 
realizes that they don't have an ordinary droid as Andrew 
begins to experience emotions and creative thought. In a 
story that spans two centuries, Andrew learns the intricacies 
of humanity while trying to stop those who created him 
from destroying him.
